full_text:
DANCE HALLS – ILLUMINATION.

	No person conducting, maintaining or carrying on a dancing academy or public dance shall permit any instructor who is under twenty-one (21) years to give instructions in dancing to persons of the opposite sex in an private room, booth, alcove or enclosure, every part of which is not clearly visible at all times from the main dance floor located upon the same floor in such dancing academy or public dance hall.

1.catch_line: Firearms – Knives – Slingshots – Sale To Minors.

7.catch_line: Dancing Academy – When Infant May Attend.

9.catch_line: Dancing Academy – False Signature In Authorization.

15.catch_line: Display Of Drug Paraphernalia To Minors.

16.catch_line:
Restrictions On Locations Where Drug Paraphernalia May
Be Sold.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

DANCE HALLS – ILLUMINATION. (§ 45.16)

  DANCE HALLS – ILLUMINATION.	No person conducting, maintaining or carrying
on a dancing academy or public dance shall permit any instructor who is under
twenty-one (21) years to give instructions in dancing to persons of the opposite
sex in an private room, booth, alcove or enclosure, every part of which is not
clearly visible at all times from the main dance floor located upon the same
floor in such dancing academy or public dance hall.
